query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_anexos_processed;

CREATE VIEW vw_anexos_processed AS
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.entity_type,
  s.entity_id,
  s.label,
  s.url,
  s.attachment_url,
  s.attachment_type,
  s.extracted_text,
  s.extracted_entities,
  s.confidence_score,
  s.processed_at,
  s.processed_by,
  s.created_at,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.processed_at IS NOT NULL THEN 'processed'
    ELSE 'pending'
  END AS status,
  CASE 
    WHEN s.confidence_score >= 0.9 THEN 'high'
    WHEN s.confidence_score >= 0.7 THEN 'medium'
    WHEN s.confidence_score > 0 THEN 'low'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END AS confidence_level,
  CHAR_LENGTH(COALESCE(s.extracted_text, '')) AS text_length,
  JSON_LENGTH(COALESCE(s.extracted_entities, '[]')) AS entities_count
FROM ai_sources s
WHERE s.attachment_url IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY s.created_at DESC;
